title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: tool to run Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other LLMs locally with a simple CLI and REST API.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client library for Ollama; chat, embed, pull models in a few lines.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node & browsers; same API surface as Python lib.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package to use Ollama models as LLMs or embedders.

title: ollama-webui (ollama-webui/ollama-webui)
summary: Full-featured, self-hosted ChatGPT-style web interface for Ollama with multi-user support.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama; Android friendly, fluent API.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Community-maintained Ruby gem for interacting with the Ollama API.

title: ollama-cli (go-llama)
summary: Rich TUI (terminal UI) for chatting with Ollama models, written in Go.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that turns Ollama models into inline code copilots.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration by deepset to use Ollama models in RAG pipelines.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU & PVC support.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official Docker images (CPU & CUDA) published to Docker Hub.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Community .NET SDK for Ollama; supports .NET 6+ and streaming chat.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate providing typed, async bindings to the Ollama REST API.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger (CI) module to spin up Ollama containers in your pipelines for testing.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin that lets you query local Ollama models from within notes.

title: ollama-slackbot
summary: Python Slack bot that answers questions using any Ollama model.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG example using Ollama embeddings + Chroma + LangChain in a notebook.
